title: Share of IT budgets spent on IT security FY2005-FY2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Fiscal Year in the x axis and Share of total IT budget in the y axis.
The Share of total IT budget is appeared to be the highest at Fiscal Year FY2017 and lowest at Fiscal Year FY2006.
The Share of total IT budget of Fiscal Year FY2017 is 1.47% larger than the minimum value at FY2006.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of total IT budget for 13 number of Fiscal Years.
The maximum Share of total IT budget 10.6 is found at Fiscal Year FY2017 and the minimum is found at FY2006 where Fiscal Year is 7.2.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Fiscal Year in the x axis and Share of total IT budget in the y axis.
The Share of total IT budget is appeared to be the highest at Fiscal Year FY2017 and lowest at Fiscal Year FY2006.
The Share of total IT budget of Fiscal Year FY2017 is 1.47% larger than the minimum value at FY2006.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Fiscal Year in the x axis and Share of total IT budget in the y axis.
The maximum Share of total IT budget 10.6 is found at Fiscal Year FY2017 and the minimum is found at FY2006 where Fiscal Year is 7.2.
Fiscal Year FY2016 has the second highest value for Share of total IT budget.
The Share of total IT budget of Fiscal Year FY2017 is 1.47% larger than the minimum value at FY2006.
The Fiscal Year FY2017 has the highest Share of total IT budget, followed by FY2016, and FY2015. Down to the Fiscal Year FY2006 which is the lowest.
Fiscal Year FY2005, and FY2007 have a similar Share of total IT budget that is 7.5.
The highest value 10.6 at FY2017 is almost 1.19 times larger than the average value 8.89.
